Name: Advanced Final Attack
Desc:
Permanently increases Attack, and significantly increases Final Attack's activation rate and damage.
Required Skill: Lv. 20 Final Attack

H.Old:
Permanently increases Attack by +30.
[Final Attack Typed Skill] Attacks create a 60% chance of casting Final Attack that inflicts 170% damage 3 times.
H.New:
Permanently increases ATT +30
[Final Attack Type Skill] A 60% chance of Final Attack that attacks at 170% Damage 3 times
